description: Console for the Metasploit Framework. More information: https://docs.rapid7.com/metasploit/msf-overview.

useCases.description: Launch the console [q]uietly without any banner:
E[x]ecute console commands (Note: use ; for passing multiple commands):
useCases.syntax: msfconsole --execute-command "{{use auxiliary/server/capture/ftp; set SRVHOST 0.0.0.0; set SRVPORT 21; run}}"
